verses.content: Upa chun: Dittak Gaia, titakzeta ka ihmangai kuoma chun,
Dittak, i thlarau chun malsâwm- na a hmu angin, iengkima malsâwm- na i hmu le i dam theina dingin ka ṭawngṭai hlak a nih.
Unauhai hungin, i takzie, (thu- taka i um hlakzie) an mi hung inhriettir lai khan, ka lâwm bêk bêk sih a.
Ka nauhai thutakah an um ti ka hriet nêka lâwmna nasa lem hrim ka nei nawh.
Dittak, unauhai mikhuol ni sien- lakhawm, an chunga i thaw ta- phawtah ringumtakin i thaw hlak a;
chuongchun, kohranhai hmaah i hmangaina an inhriettir tah; anni an inzinnaah Pathien mi ni âwm hrima i ṭhangpui chun ṭhâng a tih;
a Hming lei chun Jentailhai kuoma inthawkin iengkhawm la loin an suok sih a.
Chuongchun, thutak thawpuitu- hai ei ni theina dingin chuong ang mi chu eini chun ei lâwm ding a nih.
Kohranhai kuoma khan thu tlâwmtê chu ka ziek tah; nisienla- khawm, Diotrepha, anni laia chung- hnung nuom hlak khan, a mi lâwm si nawh.

Chuleiin, ka hung chun chu a thilthawhai inhriet suoktir nâwk ka tih, kan chungthu suol hrilin a bautamzie hi; chu khawm chu hun a ti nawh a, ama ngeiin unauhai a lâwm nawh a, a lâwm nuomhai khawm a khap a, kohrana inthawkin a hnawt dawk hlak.
Dittak, suol chu inchûk naw la, ṭhat chu inchûk lem rawh. Thil ṭha thawtu chu Pathiena inthawk a na, thil suol thawtu chun Pathien a hmu ngai nawh.
Demetri chun mi po po inpâk a hlaw a, thutaka inpâk ngei a hlaw bawk a; anih, keini khawmin kan inpâk a nih; kan inpâkna hi ân dik a nih ti i hriet.
I kuomah thu tamtak ziek ding ka nei a, nisienlakhawm, lekhatui le lekhazieknain i kuoma ziek ka nuom nawh a;
sâwtnawtê hnunga hmu che ka beisei lem a, chuongchun, inhma- tuoin inbieng ei tih.
Thlamuongna i chungah um raw se. Ei ruolhaiin chibai an bûk che. An hming lam sengin ruolhai chu chibai mi bûk pêk rawh.
